name: Tavern Turmoil
author: Tavern Community
abstract: Long ago, Erloth built a stall from the remains of a destroyed cart, selling mead and wine. Then the stall became a hovel, La taverne du Troll Ivre. All Andor came and went here, and landlady Gilda, Erloth's granddaughter, was known and loved throughout the land. Never had a single creature dared to attack the tavern, and no one had ever thought it possible until that morning when a farmer joined the heroes and shouted "Come quickly! The drunken troll is ravaging the tavern!"
